title: Hearings
context: [ยง346-245] Hearings. The protective proceedings shall be heard without a jury. The hearing may be adjourned from time to time. The general public shall be excluded, and only such persons as are found by the court to have a direct interest in the case shall be admitted. [L 1989, c 381, pt of ยง1; am L 1990, c 144, ยง1 and c 234, ยง9]
